name: Buds (BudsGDA)
description:
Your sister passed away a year ago and you have had a difficult time moving on. You recently moved to a new city, Hitachinaka, in order to get a fresh start. You are reluctant to meet new people and make friends, but you know this will help you to heal from your loss in the long run.

See your relationships grow and bloom in Buds : the platonic visual novel/plant care sim.
